messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] was: teen yahoo group now unschooling.com boards
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/23/02 8:37:21 PM, craun@velocitus.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/23/02 8:37:21 PM, craun@... writes:

<< I have tried and tried to post there. It is too confusing for me. Some
posts are old and you have no idea if anyone has responded to you unless you
remember where you posted.... >>

Use "new messages" at the bottom, and just read since a little before you
last posted. Then you'll only see new things.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] was: teen yahoo group now unschooling.com boards
messages.msgSnippet: when you go to the boards, click on  cloick on  after making sure that the drop down box reads
messages.messageBody:
when you go to the boards, click on <New messages>
cloick on <new since I last checked for messages> after making sure that the
drop down box reads <all threads>and the button for <show as message tree> is
checked. You have to be registered with a user name and password, have you
done that?
Once you have done the above, all the latest postings will show.
Start at the top , click on a thread, reading the whole page and use your
browsers' back button to return to the previous page. Keep moving back &forth
through the pages and it will work out.
Elissa
ps. Even though you have a hard time navigating, maybe your daughter (?)
won't!
